title: These Are Killing Your Church - Episode 63
itunes:title: These Are Killing Your Church - Episode 63
description:
Are events killing your church? Every church has events, but not every church knows why. Events have the potential to be helpful for people to take their next steps toward Jesus, but it's rare that they actually work.

In this episode, Tony and Amy discuss 6 questions to ask when planning events as well as 5 ways to make your events effective. 

There is a ton of great information in this episode and we created a Discussion Guide to go along with it if you'd like to take this conversation to your next leadership team meeting. To get the Discussion Guide and join in on the conversation visit http://www.theunstuckgroup.com/episode63.
